H0.text: More commonly known as the thigh bone, what is the medical name for the longest bone in the human body. Tibia

H1.text: More commonly known as the thigh bone, what is the medical name for the longest bone in the human body. Humerus

H2.text: More commonly known as the thigh bone, what is the medical name for the longest bone in the human body. Sternum

H3.text: More commonly known as the thigh bone, what is the medical name for the longest bone in the human body. Femu

A4.text: The femur is the only bone in the upper leg and the longest bone in the human body.
